Name: Disposal of solid waste
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the disposal of solid waste.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Chapter one of title 16 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding thereto a new section 16-141 to read as follows:
§16-141 Disposal of solid waste. The Commissioner shall be required to provide for the final disposal of no less than five thousand tons per day of non-recyclable solid waste by a method other than landfilling or incineration no later than July 1, 2015 
§2. This law shall take effect immediately. 

Int. 95/2004
CJC
